achievements: Known for his minimalist and elegant designs.
Headed the Italian fashion house Gianfranco Ferré from 1978 to 1996.
Designed for Dior Haute Couture from 1989 to 1996.
Played as a forward for clubs such as Napoli, Chelsea, and Parma.
Known for his technical skills and goalscoring ability.
Managed several English football clubs including West Ham United and Watford.
